result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

records.addlTxt: Plea/sentencing hearing on November 18, 2022 at 01:30 pm.
Letter to Judge Nordstrand from Atty Loberg requesting plea/sentencing hearing. Per SJN remove PSC and schedule for plea. kp/gll
Misdemeanor and Criminal Traffic Scheduling Order. Signed by SJN on 7/25/2022. c: DA and Atty via e-file. km

It is hereby ordered, as a condition of the defendant's bond/bail in the above-captioned case, that he/she have absolutely NO CONTACT whatsoever with the complaining witness, or with any of the following named persons and/or locations, Antonia L.  The term "no contact" is hereby defined as no contact in person, by telephone, by way of electronic device, email, facsimile, social media including but not limited to texting, Facebook, Twitter, contact through the mail, and/or through a third person.  The aforementioned condition of bond/bail is set pursuant to Sec. 969.02(3)(d), Wis Stats.

If the defendant fails to comply with the conditions of his/her bond/bail that he/she may be charged with the offense of bail jumping.

1:04 PM CO: SJN, RPR: V. Deiss, Clerk: B Harris,  Prosecuting attorney Karl E Anderson with intern Connor Smith in court for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant Thomas Gerald LeVasseur in court.  Attorney Jens Hubert Loberg in court for Thomas Gerald LeVasseur.  Court informs def of charges, possible penalties and rights. Def understands.  Waives reading.  NG.  Court sets bond and next court appearances.  Adjourned at 1:07 PM. bph
